text: Fray Bentos is a city in Uruguay. It is the capital of the RÃ­o Negro Department. In 2015, the Barrio Anglo is the location of the industrial landscape that was declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site as the "Fray Bentos Cultural-Industrial Landscape". == References == Category:Cities in Uruguay Category:Capitals of Uruguayan departments Category:World Heritage Sites in South America
title: Fray Bentos
